update IMOS_WMS_List_Detail
List_No = #{单据编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
List_DetailNo = #{单据明细编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Business_No = #{ERP单据编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Order_No = #{订单编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_Code = #{物料编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_Name = #{物料名称, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_TypeCode = #{类型代码, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_TypeName = #{类型名称, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_Spec = #{物料规格, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_Unit = #{物料单位, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Qty = #{数量, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where List_No = #{单据编号}
mapper.select: select A.* ,B.* from IMOS_WMS_List_Detail as A inner join IMOS_WMS_List as B on A.List_No = B.List_No WHERE A.Material_Code LIKE #{物料编号} and B.List_Type = 'I'
